GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Adobe Acrobat Reader, Lync, SkyDrive Storage for Documents and Notes, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, OneNote, PDF, Outlook, Office 365
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Battery, Data Cable, Charger, Quick Guide, Handset, Headset

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports WMV, MP4, 3GP, 3G2, MOV, AVI, M4V, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (AVCRP 1.4, A2DP 1.2, OPP 1.1, HFP 1.5, LE, PBAP 1.1)

Other Features.Important Apps: Google Talk, Windows Live Messenger, WhatsApp, Yahoo Messenger, Skype, Facebook, Yahoo, Gmail, Nokia Mail, Hotmail, Instant Messaging, LinkedIn, Twitter
Other Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: High Brightness Mode, Color Boosting, Brightness Control, Wide Viewing Angle, Super-sensitive Touch, Corning Gorilla Glass 2, Curved Display, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Lumia Color Profile, Sunlight Readability Enhancements

Platform.Processor: 1.2 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core
